cafe_transformed.speaker: Narrator
cafe_transformed.text: Dragon Haven Cafe has been transformed. Lanterns hang from every beam, flowers adorn every surface, and the aroma of the finest feast you've ever prepared fills the air.

guests_arrive.speaker: Narrator
guests_arrive.text: One by one, your friends arrive. Marcus with his travel-worn cloak. Lily in elegant attire. Garrett carrying a bouquet of flowers. Vera in her captain's best.

noble_entrance.speaker: Narrator
noble_entrance.text: The Noble enters - and for the first time, removes their mask, revealing a kind face marked by former nobility and genuine warmth.

siblings_together.speaker: Narrator
siblings_together.text: Elena and Thomas arrive arm in arm, still tentative but together. The sight brings a smile to everyone's face.

mother_speaks.speaker: Mother
mother_speaks.text: *Standing at the head of the table* Thank you all for coming. You may not know it, but each of you has been part of something extraordinary.

mother_reveals.speaker: Mother
mother_reveals.text: My child here is the heir to an ancient legacy - a guardian of dragons, a keeper of sanctuary. And you, each of you, have helped them become who they were meant to be.

dragon_display.speaker: Narrator
dragon_display.text: Your dragon rises and spreads its magnificent wings, scales catching the lantern light like living jewels. Gasps of wonder fill the room.

marcus_toast.speaker: Marcus
marcus_toast.text: *Raising his glass* I've traveled to the ends of the earth, but I've never found a home like this. To Dragon Haven - and to our friend who makes it special!

lily_toast.speaker: Lily
lily_toast.text: *Standing with grace* I came here critical and cold. I leave... no, I stay... warm and grateful. This place taught me that perfection includes imperfection.

garrett_toast.speaker: Garrett
garrett_toast.text: *Voice trembling* My Margaret would have loved this. Thank you for helping an old man find joy again.

vera_toast.speaker: Vera
vera_toast.text: *Her eyes bright* I captained ships across stormy seas, but the hardest voyage was finding peace. This cafe was my safe harbor.

noble_toast.speaker: The Noble
noble_toast.text: *Face finally visible, vulnerable* I hid behind a mask for years. Here, I learned that who I truly am is enough.

siblings_toast.speaker: Elena
siblings_toast.text: *Glancing at Thomas* We lost five years to pride and stubbornness. Dragon Haven gave us the chance to find each other again.

thomas_adds.speaker: Thomas
thomas_adds.text: To family. The one you're born with, and the one you choose.

feast_begins.speaker: Narrator
feast_begins.text: The feast begins in earnest. Laughter fills the air. Stories are shared. Your dragon moves among the guests, accepting pets and praise with regal dignity.

night_continues.speaker: Narrator
night_continues.text: As the night wears on, you look around at the faces of those who have become your chosen family. This is what Dragon Haven was always meant to be.

end_scene.speaker: Mother
end_scene.text: *Squeezing your hand* Elara would be so proud. I am so proud. This is your legacy now - not just the dragon bond, but this: a family of misfits who found each other.
